TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Action implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.ActionBase

summary.span: 表示一个 Excel 工作簿中的智能标记操作，该工作簿通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

span.span: Represents a smart tag action in an Excel workbook that is customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特定类型的智能标记识别时，操作是在智能标记快捷菜单上的可用选项。Actions are the choices available on the smart tag shortcut menu when a smart tag of a certain type is recognized. 若要创建操作，请使用`Globals.Factory.CreateAction`方法来创建对象...To create an action, use the `Globals.Factory.CreateAction` method to create an object.. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage 此类型旨在用于 Excel 2007 仅在项目中。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007. Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010.. [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建与评选，术语"销售"和正则表达式"[我|我] ssue\s\d{5,6}"。The following code example creates a with an that recognizes the term "sale" and the regular expression "[I|i]ssue\s\d{5,6}". 该操作修改在运行时操作的菜单标题，并显示已识别的文本的地址。The action modifies the menu caption of the action at run time and displays the address of the text that was recognized. 若要测试该示例，在一个单元格中键入单词"销售"和字符串"问题的 12345"在另一个单元格中，然后重试的智能标记操作。To test the example, type the word "sale" in one cell and the string "issue 12345" in another cell, and then try the smart tag action. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#1)]

Docs.summary:
在用户单击智能标记图标之后、智能标记菜单显示之前发生。
Occurs after the user clicks the smart tags icon, and before the smart tag menu is displayed. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于更改基于上下文的智能标记标题。This event gives you an opportunity to change the smart tag caption based on context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序将修改操作的菜单标题。The event handler modifies the menu caption of the action. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#3)]

Docs.summary:
在智能标记菜单中的操作被单击时发生。
Occurs when the action in the smart tag menu is clicked. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会显示包含识别的智能标记术语或表达式的单元格的地址。The event handler displays the address of the cell that contains the recognized smart tag term or expression. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#4)]
